ModMetaData.name: Ultima Core
ModMetaData.author: Bowen
ModMetaData.description:
v1.3.1.8 Ultima Core is as the name suggests, a core mod. It is mostly XMLs for the races, factions and cultures to be shared with other Ultima mods. As well as some basic apparel that is also meant to be shared.
Mods required ============= Humanoid Alien Races 2.0
Please visit the Discord channel for questions and feedback. I will not promise that I will read or even see the steam comments. Thanks.
RimWorlds of Ultima Discord: https://discord.gg/pgSbHce
